New Records: Rohit Sharma became the first player to score 87 runs in a World Cup match
Shubman Gill scored 9 runs off just 13 balls, the fastest for India in a World Cup match
Rohit Sharma reached 1500 ODI runs in the match
Rohit Sharma was named Player of the Match
Key Match Events: India lost quick wickets in the middle overs but managed to post a competitive total
England's batting collapsed after a decent start, leading to a significant turning point
The match saw high-pressure moments, including the final overs where India defended a total
Pre-Game Insights: England elected to field first, giving them a slight advantage
The match was part of the World Cup 2023-24 series, with significant implications for India's campaign
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed pride in the team's resilience after the win
The victory provided a morale boost for India ahead of the upcoming matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Bharat Ratna Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee Ekana Cricket Stadium in Lucknow
The match was a crucial one in the World Cup series, with both teams aiming for a strong performance
Others: The match was a 50-over game, played under lights, with a maximum of 50 overs per side
